'''Bedrock Editor v1.1.6''' is a minor release for [[Bedrock Editor]] released on October 14, 2025.<ref>{{cite|url=https://github.com/Mojang/minecraft-editor/discussions/267|title=Release 1.1.6 (1.21.130.20)|website=GitHub|date=October 14, 2025}}</ref><ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/40147803190669-Minecraft-Beta-Preview-1-21-130-20|title=Minecraft Beta & Preview - 1.21.130.20|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=October 14, 2025}}</ref>

== Additions ==
* Added <code>IListPanePropertyItem</code> to pane API to create lists with text, button, checkbox and image components.
* Added cubemap controls to the Vibrant Visuals Settings Pane.

== Changes ==
* Updated Line Tool's middle selector to now change to Hermite curve automatically when moving the gizmo.
* Updated Jigsaw Tool to automatically import template pools from loaded behavior packs.
* Updated Settings data to be saved across sessions, users need to manually save the Settings.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed a bug that caused Editor scaling to be broken.
* Fixed a bug that prevented Summon tool from spawning custom entities.
* Fixed a bug which caused detached gizmo to appear during ruler drag while axis locked.
